text: avarellaru ondadaru nim'ma virud'dha nera yud'dhakke iliyalararu. Heccendare avaru bhadra kotegalalli avitu kondu athava godegala mareyinda matra horada ballaru. Avara paraspara vaisamyavu tivravagide. Avaru oggattagiruvarendu nivu bhavisuttiri. Adare avara manas'sugalu chidravagive. Idekendare, avaru bud'dhi ullavaralla
